title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus
description: A Commenting System Powered By Github Discussions
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Giscus
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/readme","text":" <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Version-]] [get[version]] [[-red?style=flat&logo=dev.to&logoColor=red]] +[join[]]}}} /> <$image source={{{ [[][https://img.shields.io/badge/Author-]] [get[author]] [[-lightblue?style=flat]] +[join[]]}}} />
<> <$set name="repo" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class="get-started" tooltip={{{ [get[repo]addsuffix[ discussions]] }}}> <>
<<< 💎 A Commenting System Powered By Github Discussions. Let Visitors Leave Comments And Reactions On Your Site With Github! This Project Is Strongly Inspired By Utterances. <<< !! Usage * Ctrl-Shift-G 显示评论， 或者点击界面上的这个图标 {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon-gem}} !! NOTE * 由于使用modal现实评论， filter 的配置项不再使用， 也没有使用的必要了， 仅作为保留 * 如果想要使用旧版的1.2.1, 卸载此插件的依赖项即可`$:/plugins/Gk0Wk/focused-tiddler` 或者卸载hotzone插件 !! TODO * 统一button样式 * 提供未配置检测警告 * 提供依赖检测警告 "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/explore":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/explore","text":"<$macrocall $name="tree" prefix={{{ [addsuffix[/]] }}}> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter","text":"[field:giscus[yes]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-config","text":"\whitespace trim \define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config \define tidFilter() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter You may have to save and reload the wiki to activate changes. * Install giscus for your github repo [[Install Giscus|https://github.com/apps/giscus/installations/new]] * [[get giscus parameter|https://giscus.app/zh-CN]] change badge style   <$select field="style" tiddler=<> tooltip='badge style'> <>
Github Repo Link: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="repo" tag="input" placeholder="username/repo" default="" />
Github Reop Id: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="repoId" tag="input" placeholder="TSJHFJDKHJExxx" default="" />
Github Repo Category Id: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="categoryId" placeholder="DKSOFHGJVDKLXX" tag="input" default="" />
Giscus theme: <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="gtheme" placeholder="light" tag="input" default="" />
filter: <$edit-text tiddler=<> placeholder="[!is[system]]" tag="input" default="" /> <$button> Reset filter <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>>/>
"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon-gem":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon-gem","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon01":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon01","type":"image/png","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/neotw-setup/giscus":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/neotw-setup/giscus","key":"((giscus))","tags":"$:/tags/KeyboardShortcut","text":"<$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal"/> "},"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/giscus":{"title":"$:/config/ShortcutInfo/giscus","text":"giscus "},"$:/config/shortcuts/giscus":{"title":"$:/config/shortcuts/giscus","text":"Ctrl-Shift-G"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/discussions":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/discussions","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\whitespace trim \define giscusDiscussions() <$set name="base-repo" value="https://github.com/"> <$set name="target" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class=<>> get[repo]addsuffix[/discussions]addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> 💎 Discussions \end \define giscusBadge() <$set name="base-repo" value="https://github.com/"> <$set name="imgshield" value="https://img.shields.io/github/discussions/"> <$set name="target" value="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config"> <$button class=<>> get[repo]addsuffix[/discussions]addprefix]}}} target="_blank"> get[repo]addprefixaddsuffix[?style=]] [get[style]] +[join[]]}}} > \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/get-started":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/macro/get-started","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":" \define nbtn(started-tid, class:"get-started", caption:"Get Started") <$button class=$class$ tooltip="$caption$"> $caption$ <$action-navigate $to={{{ $started-tid$ }}}/> \end \define nav-tid(tid) <$button setTitle=<> setField="text" setTo=$tid$ class="os-started"> GettingStarted \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".o-giscus-comment .tc-modal, .o-giscus-comment .tc-modal-header, .o-giscus-comment .tc-modal-body, .o-giscus-comment .tc-modal-footer { border-radius: 10px; border: none; background-color: #F5F5F5; } .o-giscus-comment .tc-modal-footer { display:none; } .o-giscus-comment .tc-modal-header { text-transform: capitalize; } .os-started:hover { transform: scale(1.01); transition: transform .2s; } .gsc-left-header { display: none !important; } #__next .text-sm { font-size: .875rem; line-height: 1.25rem; color: red !important; } .get-started { display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 10px 25px; border-radius: 5px; border-color: white; white-space: nowrap; transition: background-color 0.2s ease-out 0s; } .nbtn { display: inline-block; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 3px 8px; white-space: nowrap; border-radius: 5px; transition: background-color 0.2s ease-out 0s; } .giscus-footer { color: #aaaaaa; font-size: 14px; margin-top: 10px; } .giscus-footer:hover { } "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/close-modal":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/close-modal","text":"<$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="close">   <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<>/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal","mask-closable":"yes","subtitle":"💎 {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/close-modal}}","class":"o-surfing-keys tc-modal-centered","text":"<$giscus id={{$:/temp/focussedTiddler}}/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/ui/giscus-modal":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/ui/giscus-modal","tags":"$:/tags/PageControls","caption":"giscus on modal","list-before":"$:/core/ui/Buttons/close","description":"giscus on modal","text":"\whitespace trim <$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]!is[missing]]"> <$button message="giscus" tooltip="comment" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param="$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/giscus-modal"/> {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/icon}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="giscus"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/viewtemplate":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/viewtemplate","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","text":"<$list filter="[all[current]!is[system]!is[draft]subfilter{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/filter}]" variable="comment"> <$list filter="[[$:/temp/focussedTiddler]is[missing]]"> <$set name="stateTiddler" value="$:/state/oeyoews/github-giscus-comments"> <$reveal type="nomatch" state=<> text=<>> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer" set=<> setTo=<> > Show Comments <$reveal type="match" state=<> text=<>> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer" set=<> setTo=""> Fold Comments <$giscus id=<> lang="en" theme={{{ [[$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config]get[gtheme]else[light]] }}}/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible giscus-footer"> Back to top ↥︎ <$action-navigate $to=<> > "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/widget":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/widget","module-type":"widget","type":"application/javascript","text":"(function() { "use strict"; // tmp settings // var usernameTiddler = "neotw/username"; // var username = $tw.wiki.getTiddlerText(usernameTiddler); // if(username !== "oeyoews") // { // alert("This giscus tiddlywiki plugin just for oeyoews build after version 0.7.0") // console.error("This giscus tiddlywiki plugin just for oeyoews build after version 0.7.0") // return; // } var Widget = require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js").widget; var GiscusNodeWidget = function(parseTreeNode, options) { this.initialise(parseTreeNode, options); }; // ?? not suport repo-id filed, use repoId instead var giscusConfigTiddler = "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-giscus/config" // console.log(giscusConfigTiddler) var giscusConfigTiddlerGet = $tw.wiki.getTiddler(giscusConfigTiddler) var config = giscusConfigTiddlerGet ? giscusConfigTiddlerGet.fields : {}; // console.log(config) // debug // console.log(config.repo) // console.log(config.repoId) // console.log(config.categoryId) GiscusNodeWidget.prototype = new Widget(); GiscusNodeWidget.prototype.render = function(parent, nextSibling) { this.parentDomNode = parent; this.computeAttributes(); this.execute(); var id = this.getAttribute("id", ""); var lang = this.getAttribute("lang", "en"); var theme = this.getAttribute("theme", "light"); if (id === '') return; var scriptNode = this.document.createElement('script'); scriptNode.setAttribute("src", "https://giscus.app/client.js"); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-repo", config.repo); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-repo-id", config.repoId); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-category", "General"); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-category-id", config.categoryId); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-mapping", "specific"); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-term", id); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-reactions-enabled", "1"); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-emit-metadata", "1"); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-input-position", "top"); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-theme", theme); scriptNode.setAttribute("data-lang", lang); scriptNode.setAttribute("crossorigin", "anonymous"); scriptNode.setAttribute("async", "true"); // Clear other comment nodes' giscus class var commentNodes = this.document.querySelectorAll('.giscus'); for (var i = 0, len = commentNodes.length; i < len; i++) { commentNodes[i].classList.remove('giscus'); } // Find or create var commentNode = this.document.querySelector('.oeyoews-giscus[tiddler-title="' + id.replace('"', '\\"') + '"]'); if (!commentNode) { commentNode = this.document.createElement('div'); commentNode.setAttribute('class', 'giscus oeyoews-giscus'); commentNode.setAttribute('tiddler-title', id); parent.insertBefore(commentNode, nextSibling); this.domNodes.push(commentNode); } parent.insertBefore(scriptNode, nextSibling); this.domNodes.push(scriptNode); }; GiscusNodeWidget.prototype.execute = function() {}; GiscusNodeWidget.prototype.refresh = function() { var changedAttributes = this.computeAttributes(); if (Object.keys(changedAttributes).length > 0) { this.refreshSelf(); return true; } else { return false; } }; exports.giscus = GiscusNodeWidget; })(); "}}}
